title: Game Progress Route
content:
you will gain Astarion's approval.

You can now return to the Myconid Colony and speak with Spaw to report to him what took place.

If you choose the first one, you will gain the approval of Karlach. Spaw is pleased with this and tells you that you can now claim the promised rewards. However, he informs you that threat still remains in the Underdark and asks you to take care of a drow named Nere, lurking in the shadows. He will give you a new quest: 'Deliver Nere's Head'.
